EmailTemplate.subject: Apply to be an Associate Mentor with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Challenge Network / Society
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
How are you? Here at The Challenge Society, we are dreaming of sunshine, and thinking about all of you who are studying for exams. Hope they are going well! We are writing to you with three exciting opportunities; to come back on The Challenge as an Associate Mentor (click on the link below), to apply to be the new youth trustee for The Challenge Network (see the application form attached), and have your say on the future of The Challenge Society.
Read on to find out more!
Have your say! We love hearing what you guys think about The Challenge Society. We want to hear your views so we can continue to make the activities we offer the best they can be. Please click here to answer a few questions – we can’t wait to hear your thoughts! https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/Z7S7BH9
The Challenge Society is inviting you to apply to be an Associate Mentor on our summer programme.
The Challenge Society are inviting you to apply to be an Associate Mentor on our summer programme. Summer is on its way. And you know what that means? The Challenge is soon to kick off again for three unforgettable weeks. And we want YOU to come back and be a part of it! Associate Mentors are Challengers who come back and volunteer with summer staff, using their knowledge and experience to support and mentor Challengers. You will be volunteering on the Real Challenge Design week, supporting Challengers to develop their campaigning skills, pitch to the Dragons and to get ready for the Real Challenge Action weekends. This is an amazing opportunity for you to stay involved in The Challenge Society; to meet up with old friends, to continue to develop your teamwork and leadership skills and to really feel you are making a difference by supporting Challengers. You will be given training beforehand and be fully supported by Challenge staff while you are volunteering with us. This is also a great chance to gain valuable experience that will help if you want to apply for other summer roles with The Challenge in the future.
Sound good? Then what are you waiting for!
Please click here for your personal application form! http://www.clicktools.com/survey?iv=3b1365e1600df14&q1={!Contact.Id}. The deadline is midday on Wednesday 30th May.
The Challenge Network is also inviting you to apply to be the new Youth Trustee
Help The Challenge Network to shape our decisions as we develop and grow by bringing in the perspectives of all the young people who have taken part in The Challenge. This is an amazing opportunity and highly regarded. You can apply to this as well as the Associate Mentor role. You will find the application form attached to this email.
We’re really looking forward to reading your applications!
Good luck!
The Challenge Society
